          <title>
            <string language="en">Wavelengths of light colours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlängen der hellen Farben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Longueurs d'onde de couleurs légères</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Wavelengths de cores claras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lunghezze d'onda dei colori chiari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μήκη κύματος των ελαφριών χρωμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Longitudes de onda de colores ligeros</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares the wavelengths of red light waves and violet light waves.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">red</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">violet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm vergleicht die Wellenlängen der 
Wellen des roten Lichtes und violettes Licht bewegt wellenartig.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme compare les longueurs d'onde des 
vagues de lumière rouge et la lumière violette ondule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara os wavelengths de ondas da 
luz vermelha e a luz violeta acena.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema confronta le lunghezze d'onda delle 
onde della luce rossa e la luce viola fluttua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα συγκρίνει τα μήκη κύματος των 
κυμάτων κόκκινου φωτός και των ιωδών φωτεινών κυμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama compara las longitudes de onda de 
las ondas de la luz roja y la luz violeta agita.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">rot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
